title: Question about the Blazing Feathers icon
body: Just curious but I didn't see any specific details but if you do the Xayah and Rakan in a TTT match will it count towards the 2 game requirement for the icon? I did both games as Xayah and Rakan with a friend playing as the other in a game of TTT and I can't tell if it counts or not.

replies.body: How can I get blazing feathers icon now on 24/08 ? i really want it :'(

AFAIK currently, you can play any game modes except for custom games in order to get the [**icon**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions)! Even bot games count ^_^.
